oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-10-21 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on October 21, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Dick Reinhart; Hiram Higsby; Oklahoma Songbirds; Mary Lou; Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Lem Hawkins tells a joke [incomplete] / (1:01) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (2:11) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (2:20) Dick Reinhart performs "Cowboy’s Heaven" / (4:52) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (5:37) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby perform "You’re Going To Miss Me When I’m Gone" / (7:40) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tells a joke / (8:32) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "Hold On Little Doggie" / (10:06) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "Hold Fast To The Right" / (12:00) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform the closing theme / (13:15) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Reinhart, Dick; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Davis, Chuck;
